name: Messari
title: Huma's Erbil Karaman on the Mechanisms Financing PayFi with Messari CEO, Eric Turner
text:
Synopsis
PayFi offers a novel financing mechanism for deep in (decentralized infrastructure) projects by tokenizing future revenue streams, enabling capital expansion through liquidity pool-backed royalties.

Key Insights
- The text discusses a financing model for blockchain infrastructure projects, specifically focusing on Bitcoin mining
- PayFi allows tokenization of future revenue streams from deep in (decentralized infrastructure) projects
- The mechanism enables capital expansion by creating a financial structure where initial liquidity pool supporters can be repaid through project royalties
- The financing approach addresses the upfront capital challenges of infrastructure projects like mining rigs, ensuring the equipment can pay for itself over time
